Name: Prohibiting the operation of shared electric scooter systems on certain streets in the Borough of Queens.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the operation of shared electric scooter systems on certain streets in the Borough of Queens

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

Attachments.Name: Minutes of the Stated Meeting - September 12, 2024

Summary: This bill would prohibit a shared electric scooter organization from operating a shared electric scooter system on certain streets in downtown Flushing.
RTF:
{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}
{\colortbl ;\red33\green37\blue41;}
\viewkind4\uc1
\ul\v0\par
Be it enacted by the Council as follows: \par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\ulnone\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\sl480\slmult1\qj Section 1. Subchapter 3 of chapter 1 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-176.4 to read as follows:\par
\ul\'a7 19-176.4 Geographic restrictions on shared electric scooter systems. a Definitions. For the purposes of this section, the following terms have the following meanings\ulnone :\par
\ul Electric scooter. The term \ldblquote electric scooter\rdblquote  has the meaning as provided in section 114-e of the vehicle and traffic law or any successor provision. \par
Shared electric scooter organization. The term \ldblquote shared electric scooter organization\rdblquote  means a natural person, organization, or entity that operates a fleet of shared electric scooters available for rent to the public on a short-term basis. \par
Shared electric scooter system. The term \ldblquote shared electric scooter system\rdblquote  means a network of self-service and publicly available electric scooters and related infrastructure.\par
b. The department shall not permit a shared electric scooter organization to install electric scooter parking corrals, authorize operators of shared electric scooters to traverse, or otherwise operate its shared electric scooter system on the following streets: \par
1. In the Borough of Queens: \par
(a) \cf1 Main Street: Northern Boulevard to Sanford Avenue;\par
(b) 38th Avenue: Prince Street to 138th Street;\par
(c) Prince Street: 38th Avenue to 39th Avenue; \par
(d) 39th Avenue: \cf0 College Point Boulevard\cf1  to Union Street;\par
(e) Lippman Plaza: 39th Avenue to Roosevelt Avenue;\par
(f) Roosevelt Avenue: \cf0 College Point Boulevard\cf1  to Union Street; \par
(g) 41st Avenue: \cf0 College Point Boulevard\cf1  to Union Street; \par
(h) Kissena Boulevard: 41st Avenue to Barclay Avenue; and\par
(i) Sanford Avenue: Frame Place to Main Street.\cf0  \par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\ulnone\'a7 2. This local law takes effect immediately.\fs18\par
\fs20 KF\par
LS #16207\par
